message.body: ￼￼Well I see a lot of similarities! Love ya!
Oh my gosh I totally see it!!! Cheeks! Can't wait to hug thT cutie at thanksgiving!! Love ya!
I can't wait to see you!!! I am missing you like crazy! Hunter coming too?
He isn't sure yet. He's seeing his parents next week and should know by then!
Ok fantastic. Thanksgiving will be quiet this year. My mom will keep herself in check. I haven't spoken to her in 8 weeks.
Oh wow. Hopefully you have had a peaceful 8 weeks. Is she going to come?

Oh it's been wonderful! Haha. I truthfully can't answer it yet. But I've invited her to andrews party and that will be the first time we've spoken and seen each other face to face. I haven't talked to Danielle either.

It sounds to me like you needed a serious break. I hope Andrews party goes well! Know I am here for you too if you ever need to blow off some steam!!!! I know how it feels to be frustrated with family.
Thank you so much. And yes the break has been fantastic! That's horrible huh?
